name: Ludum Dare 46 - Power Glove
description:
The power has gone out before your brother has finished beating the final level of his video game! Luckily you have a generator, but it's running low on power. Explore the neighborhood in search for batteries  and doing quests for your neighbors! Can you power the generator for long enough for your brother to beat his game?

Controls:

  • WASD - Move around
  • RMB - Free look
  • Shift - Run
  • E - interact / pick up
  • F - drop selected item
  • Mouse Wheel - Select item in inventory bar
  • Q - Open up active quests
  • P - Pause game
